skills.flavor: Being multilingual, I've been raised on C and Bash but my interest quickly adapted to foreign (NodeJs, Python) and antique (Assembler, Basic) languages. Dabbling into the obscure with the intention to pick up and learn as many weird things along the way as possible (ArnoldC) and always eager to learn more (currently Golang). Fact sheets only tell you so much about a person, the following skills are just a selection rather than a catalogue. Everything else we can talk about in person :)

hobbies.name: Vintage CPUs and 8-Bit Architecture
hobbies.description: I love working with minimal resources as it sparks my creativity. Programming old systems like the Amstrad CPC or classic Gameboy (both powered by Zilog Z80 derivatives) offer a zen like experience to escape the modern world. This includes not only programming in assembler but also designing and building compatible hardware.
